body: The furniture has a really nice design. It's strong , cushions also look nice . Very simple jut looks attractive. POLISH LOOKS RICH , OVERALL NICE PRODUCT . You will like it for money spent , customer service also good and caring.

title: 'This product I had bought it from Amazon and it came with easy to install option.'
body: The product is as expected and delivered without any damage. The product has satisfied my need and very accurate with the measurement. Rohit spoke to me over phone and inquired on the quality and checked if I was good with the product. I'm very satisfied, thanks guys for the safa set.  May God bless your efforts!!

title: 'Value for money üëå'
body: This is one of my best purchases on Amazon for various reasons:  - The product is superb in build, finish, and styling - The entire frame, back, and base supports are made of Sheesham wood which looks fantastic and is sturdy - The base on which the seat cushion fits is rigid MDF and seems strong, though I would have preferred it to be ply instead. - The sofas come with seat and back cushions made of firm, dense foam- do not expect 'sink-in'- soft cushions. - The back cushions are low. They rise up to half back height after sitting for a person of average height. This is also something you must keep in mind while buying the product. - The cushions have stitched fabric covers and are fixed to the MDF base, which fits into the frame, so you don't have to worry about the seat cushion sliding forward. If you have any specific requests per furnishing etc., you can discuss them with the seller to see if they are doable. - The single and two-seater sofa sizes are very spacious and can also easily accommodate big-built people comfortably - You can select the fabric color of your choice - The packaging is perfect - Timely delivery - Competitive pricing
